helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmaEasy Team,

I am writing to formally report a highly unsatisfactory experience
regarding a lab test booking and the free doctor consultation that was
promised with it.

I had booked a lab test from PharmaEasy at a higher price because it was
clearly mentioned that a free doctor consultation would be provided.
Although the consultation was technically arranged, the doctor did not
conduct it properly. I had selected the video call option; however, the
doctor seemed to be in a hurry and appeared to be travelling. Instead of a
proper video consultation, he kept the phone to his ear, and I could only
see his ear on the screen. As a result, I was unable to communicate my
concerns, and the consultation did not happen in a meaningful manner.

After the call ended, the system is showing the consultation as chargeable,
even though I could not avail the service properly. This is unacceptable,
especially for patients who trust your platform for accurate testing and
reliable support.

Therefore, I request the following:

1. Please arrange a fresh doctor consultation for me at no additional cost.
OR
2. Kindly register a formal complaint against the doctor for not fulfilling
his professional responsibility.

Additionally, I want to cancel my Plus Membership and request a full
refund, as this experience has caused inconvenience and has affected my
trust in the service.

I expect prompt action and resolution at the earliest.

Regards,
[Manoj]
 Registered Mobile Number
9627127134

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Complaint Regarding Incomplete Doctor Consultation and Request for Refund
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmaEasy Team,

I am writing to formally report a highly unsatisfactory experience regarding a lab test booking and the free doctor consultation that was promised with it.

I had booked a lab test from PharmaEasy at a higher price because it was clearly mentioned that a free doctor consultation would be provided. Although the consultation was technically arranged, the doctor did not conduct it properly. I had selected the video call option; however, the doctor seemed to be in a hurry and appeared to be travelling. Instead of a proper video consultation, he kept the phone to his ear, and I could only see his ear on the screen. As a result, I was unable to communicate my concerns, and the consultation did not happen in a meaningful manner.

After the call ended, the system is showing the consultation as chargeable, even though I could not avail the service properly. This is unacceptable, especially for patients who trust your platform for accurate testing and reliable support.

Therefore, I request the following:

1. Please arrange a fresh doctor consultation for me at no additional cost.
OR
2. Kindly register a formal complaint against the doctor for not fulfilling his professional responsibility.

Additionally, I want to cancel my Plus Membership and request a full refund, as this experience has caused inconvenience and has affected my trust in the service.

I expect prompt action and resolution at the earliest.

Regards,  
[Manoj]  
 Registered Mobile Number
9627127134

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Sir,
I Dipanwita Das had placed order of 3 product i.e Melaglow rich, Gorgeous
face cleansing gel and maxrich intensive moisturizing lotion of total Rs
1146.53 Order ID 655565757394452480 on 4th December and got delivery on 7th
December totally different item which I didn't order.
I mailed to pharmacy stating everything what happened to me on 7 th
December, after that pick up was initiated. But another problem raised with
the courier service. The courier boy is continuously deliberately
cancelling my pick up from Tuesday i.e 9th December till date stating that
OTP is not provided from my end.
If he call me, visit my place then only it is possible to provide OTP,
without visiting how is it possible to provide OTP. After getting the
message I called the courier boy whose number is 7980838348, he told me
that pick up doesn't fall under his area, so he is cancelling my pick up
and he has no other option to cancel. From Tuesday I am facing this
problem. I mailed you in this matter on 10 th December but my problem still
not resolved neither the pick up is initiated nor I got the refund amount.
It has been a week I am facing this type of harrasment. Why am I supposed
to suffer like this.
How can a person trust Pharmacy if they get such poor facility. I knew that
Pharmeasy is a trusted online medicine site but I am totally being scammed.
Either you make pick up the product and refund the amount or refund the
amount without pickup or reorder the 3 items again on my address without
any payment.
Do resolve my case as earliest as possible or else I have to complain in
Consumer Forum. I have being harrassed a lot. I need to get solution on
emergency basis . Do look into my matter on priority basis.
I have attached with this trial mail the type of delivery box I received,
the bill amount, the product I received and the unpick up messages from the
courier service.

--

 We are a company specialized in the trade and distribution of
research-grade chemicals. I would therefore like to kindly request a quotation
for the following compounds, all required at a minimum purity of 98%: 

 

 Lecozotan (CAS 433282-68-9, 100 g) 

 Robalzotan (CAS 184674-99-5, 100 g) 

 NLX-266 (CAS 2170564-20-0, 50 g)

 Xylamidine tosylate (CAS 6443-40-9, 250 g) 

 PRX-08066 (CAS 866206-54-4, 250 g) 

 SB-243213 (CAS 200940-23-4, 100 g) 

 SB-242084 (CAS 1260505-34-7, 100 g) 

 AVN-492 (CAS 1220646-23-0, 250 g)

 Razpipadon (CAS 1643489-35-3, 50 g)

 LY-2624803 (CAS 879409-35-5, 50 g) 

 Plosaracetam (CAS 1651179-19-9, 250 g) 

 Cutamesine (CAS 165377-44-6, 50 g) 

 EC586 (CAS 2140269-95-8, 1 kg) 

 MK-0159 (CAS 2641484-61-7, 500 g) 

 

 In addition, we are interested in obtaining quotations for a set of

quotation at your earliest convenience.

 Glia Thrice

notes.body: Hello Rachna,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the discount.     Please note that we do provide up to a 10% medicine/product-level discount to all of our customers. The discount details can be checked while placing an order. However, I would like to inform you that we have multiple active offers updated on the app/website.      For your future orders, you can refer to the link: https://PharmEasy.in/offers?src=header.  ​   The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout. As per the system, you have not applied any coupon code to get more discount.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

Please note that we do provide up to a 10% medicine/product-level discount to all of our customers. The discount details can be checked while placing an order. However, I would like to inform you that we have multiple active offers updated on the app/website. 

For your future orders, you can refer to the link: https://PharmEasy.in/offers?src=header.
​
The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout. As per the system, you have not applied any coupon code to get more discount.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

notes.body: Hello Vishal,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #658055433707106304-62488.     We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered but "GUTGERMINA MINI BOTTLE OF 5ML SUSPENSION - 4 BOTTLES" were missing in the parcel for which we had escalated separate ticket (22283228).      Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Vishal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #658055433707106304-62488.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered but "GUTGERMINA MINI BOTTLE OF 5ML SUSPENSION - 4 BOTTLES" were missing in the parcel for which we had escalated separate ticket (22283228). 

Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy
